p: Territory of Washington} County of Thurston.} S.S

Joseph W. Robinson being sworn says that he is one of the Attorneys for the above named Petitioners. that he has read the foregoing petition And knows fully the contents thereof, and knows the same to be true, except as to matters theirin stated upon information and belief and as to those, believes the same to be true. That he makes this Affidavit for thereon behalf of all and each of these petitioners for the reason that Jesse W. - George U.S.Marshall has forbidden and refused to allow affiant or any one for him, to enter said pententiary wherein these petetioners are confined, to secure their individual signitures and their oaths to the same.
Subscribed and sworn to before me this 6 day of Feby 1885.
Nathan S. Porter Notary Public W.T.
